keyword: how many calories in a latte
title: How Many Calories in a Latte?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a latte, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for different milk types.
h1: How Many Calories in a Latte?
assumptions: Standard 8 oz (240 ml) caffe latte with whole milk, single espresso shot, no added sugar, syrups, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by milk type, size, coffee shop, added sweeteners, and preparation; check labels or apps when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard 8 oz latte with whole milk contains about 150 kcal.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use skim milk instead of whole

faqs.q: How many calories in a latte with whole milk?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal for a standard 8 oz serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a latte?
faqs.a: Around 8 g from the milk in a standard latte.

faqs.q: Do lattes have a lot of sugar?
faqs.a: Plain lattes have natural milk sugars (~12 g); added syrups increase it.

faqs.q: How does milk type affect calories in a latte?
faqs.a: Whole milk: ~150 kcal; skim: ~90 kcal; almond: ~60-100 kcal depending on brand.
A plain latte has ~12 g carbs from milk lactose; non-dairy options may vary.
